ygData.subject: Re: Maze question
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually, there is already an option in the ingame option menu to turn the radar on and off. It would also be minimal programming to add a flag to the scenario

Actually, there is already an option in the ingame option menu to 
turn the=
 radar on and off. It would also be minimal programming to 
add a flag to t=
he scenario file to disable the radar completely for 
maze levels.

Also, d=
ph, if you need any maze generating code, let me know. I went 
through a ma=
ze phase where I made a few programs to generate random 
mazes. I also made=
 a maze generator for my TI89 calculator. :)

-sean
